The Crystal impling is the third highest-level impling that can be caught in Gielinor. Players require at least 80 Hunter (or level 77-79 with a hunter potion) to capture this type of impling with a butterfly net and an impling jar. At level 90 Hunter, crystal implings can be caught barehanded. Capturing a crystal impling grants 280 Hunter experience.

Currently, Crystal implings can only be caught from rare spawns within Prifddinas. One may be found at a time on each world, respawning approximately every 30 minutes.

Loot[edit | edit source]

At current Grand Exchange prices, opening a crystal impling jar gives 71,787 worth of loot on average.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 March 2020
(update | poll)

The loot table of crystal implings now includes crystal shards and acorns.

1 August 2019
(update)

A crystal impling spawn will no longer be unreachable between some trees.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The names given in the crystal impling's examine texts refer to the individual names of implings found in Daffyd's house in the Amlodd Clan district of RuneScape's Prifddinas after having caught certain types of implings. These are named after the team of Jagex Moderators who developed Prifddinas in RuneScape.
